name: Farmer Al Falfa See's New York
summary: Farmer Al Falfa goes to New York, money bag in hand. He is immediately spotted by a crook who dispatches a fetching lady to shake him down. At a restaurant, she gets him drunk and lays him out with knockout drops. But what's in the bag is not what she is expecting, and she flees. The now-drunken farmer has stepped dizzily outside to acquaint himself with a lamppost when another sharper steps up and hauls him into a crooked card game. While prospects do not look good for Farmer Al Falfa, he has more tricks up his sleeve than the city slickers realize.
info:
• 话数: 1
  • 导演: Paul Terry
  • 原画: J.R. Bray
  • 动画制作: Bray Studios
  • 别名: Farmer Al Falfa In New York
  • 上映年度: 1916年10月9日
